title: Field safety notices - 22 February to 26 February 2016

body.content:
Overview

If you receive a field safety notice (FSN) from a manufacturer you must always act on it.

MHRA publishes the following for information only.

If you have a question about a particular FSN contact the manufacturer.

Latest FSNs

View the latest FSNs

3M Deutschland: 3M™ Coban™ 2 and 3M™ Coban™ 2 lite

Active inflatable garment

## Overview

If you receive a field safety notice (FSN) from a manufacturer you must always act on it.

MHRA publishes the following for information only.

If you have a question about a particular FSN contact the manufacturer.

## Latest FSNs

[View the latest FSNs](https://mhra.filecamp.com/public/files/25fo-6ue3m5d5)
